RSA Module¶

rsa_utils.py

Provides RSA key generation, encryption, and decryption utilities using OAEP padding. This module is used for securely exchanging AES keys in the UDP chat application.

Author: Burak Yilmaz

secure_crypto.rsa_utils.generate_rsa_keypair()¶

Generates a 2048-bit RSA key pair.

Returns:

A tuple containing the private key and public key as byte strings.

Return type:

tuple

secure_crypto.rsa_utils.rsa_decrypt(private_key_bytes, ciphertext)¶

Decrypts an RSA-encrypted message using the recipient’s private key.

Parameters:

  • private_key_bytes (bytes) – The private RSA key.

  • ciphertext (bytes) – The RSA-encrypted message.

Returns:

The decrypted plaintext message.

Return type:

bytes

secure_crypto.rsa_utils.rsa_encrypt(public_key_bytes, message_bytes)¶

Encrypts a message using the recipient’s RSA public key.

Parameters:

  • public_key_bytes (bytes) – The recipient’s public RSA key.

  • message_bytes (bytes) – The plaintext message to encrypt.

Returns:

The RSA-encrypted message.

Return type:

bytes

Udp_secure_chat
